thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 5 of 147
thread.title: RK Taylor

author: RK Taylor
title: RK Taylor
text: When I got my cards I realized my choice of font/color combination made my info hard to read while not backlit (like on my Mac screen). I inquired with customer service and Nicole was almost immediately responsive to any question I had. I was surprised at how easy it was to smooth out any issues. She worked with me to get it right, and she was very professional and kind. Loved my experience here!
